mapper.insert: insert into user(user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_serialNo, user_regDate, user_birth, user_phone, user_addr) values(#{user_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_serialNo}, now(), #{user_birth}, #{user_phone}, #{user_addr})
mapper.select: select * from user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
select count(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
